title: Anthropic Claude Plugins Marketplace - Firecrawl Entry (marketplace.json)
author: Anthropic / Firecrawl team
key_insight: Firecrawl's official listing in Anthropic's own Claude Code plugin marketplace uses source type 'url' pointing to a git repository that implements a CLI-based Skill integration. Despite Firecrawl also maintaining a separate MCP server (firecrawl-mcp-server), the marketplace entry deliberately uses the CLI/Skill approach. This is direct evidence from Anthropic's own curated registry that CLI over MCP is the preferred pattern for agent tool integration.
context: The marketplace.json contains ~50 plugins. Firecrawl is the last entry. The source field specifies 'url' type with a git repo, not an MCP server configuration. The plugin installs a CLI skill, not an MCP server.
extraction_method: WebFetch from GitHub blob and raw URL
